string.text: Radar

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Radar%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Psi anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
It is a localized breach in the noosphere. It deals psi damage and has a weak psi aura, which nevertheless affects the stalkers directly, penetrating through any defenses.
Darkness

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Darkness%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Psi anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
A terrifying kind of formation of unknown origin, affecting the mind of any sentient being in its vicinity. There are rumors that the anomaly acts as a shelter for poltergeists.
Flash

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Flash%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Temporal anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
A rift in the space-time continuum. The creature caught in the anomaly experiences rapid time travel to an unknown temporal distance. Despite the seeming danger, some clever stalkers even use these rifts for their own purposes, such as escaping from pursuit or waiting for the best moment to find artifacts.
Ghost

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Ghost%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Electro-chemical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Spherical electro-chemical anomaly. Distinctive feature - the anomaly moves along a fixed path through a certain area, as if trying to find another victim.
Liquid Gold

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Liquid Gold%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Chemical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
The twin brother of the Fruit Punch anomaly, emits a cloud of orange/gold toxic chemical substance. The substance uncomfortably heats body, leading to severe water deprivation
Green Dragon

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Green Dragon%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Chemical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
A poisonous cloud of unknown chemical composition. The anomaly cloud adversely affects the biological functions of the trapped organism, as if enveloping it in kissel and greatly reducing its motor abilities.
Mephistopheles

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Mephistopheles%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Electro-chemical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
For some reason, named after a medieval evil spirit, the strange flower-like formation. It emits an extremely unpleasant sound in close proximity.
Net

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Net%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Gravity-electrical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
This formation is a stream of charged particles accelerated under the action of gravity. The object falling into the space of the anomaly, the particles envelope it like a net, for which this anomaly got its name
Ball Lightning

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Ball Lightning%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Electrical anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Anomaly of electrical nature, reminiscent of the well-known natural phenomenon. It has an unconfirmed interaction with electrical objects, especially with batteries and capacitors, filling them with electrical energy. Nevertheless you should not be too fond of getting close to the anomaly for safety reasons.
Press

• Name: %c[d_cyan]Press%c[ui_gray_1] 
• Type: %c[d_orange]Gravitational anomaly%c[ui_gray_1] 
 
%c[d_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
Gravitational anomaly, which is a concentrated standing waves of space, forming some kind of disc, perpendicular to the ground. This disc can act as a kind of shield or cover that repels or reduces the speed of fast objects such as bullets or projectiles, which can be used by stalkers to their advantage.
